summary: Header and footer logo references were updated to use `MR icon-1.png` via `getPublicAssetUrl(...)`, and `frontend/index.html` favicon links were updated to point to `/assets/MR%20icon-1.png`. However, the actual image file was not added to the public assets in the provided diff summary, so serving the logo/favicon without 404s is not fully ensured by these changes alone.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the uploaded image file (MR icon-1.png) to the frontend public static assets directory (served under /assets/...).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, so there is no evidence that `MR icon-1.png` was placed into the frontend public assets directory.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/used a "Get Directions" link in the footer contact section (uses `CONTACT.location.directionsUrl`) and imported the `Navigation` icon.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to swap the logo and favicon to the uploaded image; it does not request adding new footer links or contact behavior.
